messages.title: Straight talking.
messages.content: I am standing as a parliamentary candidate to give you the opportunity to express your desire to leave the European Union and bring decision-making back to our elected representatives in Westminster and our local councils.

messages.title: My local issues are
messages.content: Continue to fight to maintain local health services. Support local youth initiatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Express the desire to leave the European Union and return decision-making to Westminster and local councils.
Continue to fight to maintain local health services.
Regain control of our borders and our legal system.

issues.brexitEurope: Express your desire to leave the European Union.
issues.governance: Bring decision-making back to our elected representatives in Westminster and our local councils.
issues.health: Fight to maintain local health services.

contactInformation.address: UK Independence Party, PO Box 408, Newton Abbot TQ12 9BG.

images.caption: Election communication for the UK Independence Party - Peter Bowman for Cheltenham.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Please detach this coupon and enclose in an envelope on which you can write the Freepost address - no stamp required. Send to Freepost RSL-HZBG-UBBG, UK Independence Party, PO Box 408, Newton Abbot TQ12 9BG.
